MonsterTrait.Name: Death Burst
MonsterTrait.Text: When the mephit dies, it leaves behind a cloud of smoke that fills a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on its space. The sphere is heavily obscured. Wind disperses the cloud, which otherwise lasts for 1 minute.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The mephit can innately cast dancing lights, requiring no material components. Its innate spellcasting ability is Charisma.

MonsterAction.Name: Claws
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Cinder Breath (Recharge 6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The mephit exhales a 15-foot cone of smoldering ash. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or be blinded until the end of the mephit's next turn .

MonsterTrait.Name: Variant: Summon Mephits (1/Day)
MonsterTrait.Text: The mephit has a 25 percent chance of summoning 1d4 mephits of its kind. A summoned mephit appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of its summoner, acts as an ally of its summoner, and can't summon other mephits. It remains for 1 minute, until it or its summoner dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.
